title: Racing teams of NASCAR ranked by revenue 2017
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Teams, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Teams on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 180.0 is found at Teams Hendrick Motorsports and the minimum is found at Front Row Motorsports where Teams is 19.0.
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Teams is 161.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Teamss.
Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Front Row Motorsports has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Teams, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Teams on the y axis.

max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Teams, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Teams on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 180.0 is found at Teams Hendrick Motorsports and the minimum is found at Front Row Motorsports where Teams is 19.0.
Teams Richard Childress Racing has the second highest value for Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The maximum Teams Hendrick Motorsports has got 9.47 times higher Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the minimum Teams Front Row Motorsports.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars at Teams Hendrick Motorsports is 180.0 , second place is Richard Childress Racing at 145.0, and thirdly is Joe Gibbs Racing at 131.0.
The highest value 180.0 at Hendrick Motorsports is almost 1.82 times larger than the average value 99.12.
Summing up the values of all Teamss, we get total 793.0.
